comments:

quite some time.

Moving to PDE/UI for comment.

This is a known bug that has been fixed in the current code stream (will appear 
in the first integration build and is already in the nightly builds). The cause 
are out-of-sync resources found in the workspace. You probably have some 
resources changed manually in the file system and not synchronized with the 
workspace. The workaround for the problem is to call 'Refresh from Local' on 
the project (to be sure, do it on all the projects).

In the new code, PDE will tolerate out-of-sync resources but mark plug-in icons 
with error overlays in all dialogs they appear in (update classpath, import 
plug-ins, run-time workbench launcher).
